## Allocation code 

Scripts in nf-nest may need to know your cluster allocation code. 

To set the variable in your current session, use:

```{bash}
export ALLOCATION_CODE=my-alloc-code
```

To set this variable automatically next time you login:

```
echo "export ALLOCATION_CODE=my-alloc-code" >> ~/.bashrc
```
